OOC: Sorry, ask Inferno731 yourself, he promised the characters to me long 
ago when I first left the RPG. Thats one of the reasons I came back. Besides, 
you wouldnt know how to use them to there fullest potential.

    Aracnia spun around to Darkmouse. She didnt look to good, not at all. "I 
think you ought to get in a CR chamber, now." She pointed out  the door to 
the CR room.
    Paralysis jumped up and walked to the two fembots. "Commander, what about 
Rampage? Are we moving?" He asked rather egar.
    She turned her attention to the frog. "Yes, we are. As soon as Tarantulas 
gets Kitkat and the others here."

    Tarantulas gives a chuckle to Phobia, a bit confused about his remark. 
Once agian he looks around, "ARE WE GOING OR NOT?!! WE HAVE CR CHAMBERS AT 
THE BASE!!!!! LETS MOVE OUT!!!!"

    Rampage now marched through the ship, it creaked under his heavey body. 
He had to bring the main power back on, warm things up for Aracnia. The rooms 
that had been left so quickly were still a mess, and the corridors were 
scattered with debris. This place needed some work.
    "Ah, what a sight it shall be to have the Predacons together once agian! 
Soon, Megatron will join us too....and we will rule this planet! Bawhahah!" 
He mused to himself, finally reaching the control room where he would 
reestablish power to the ship.

    Inferno, in flight mode, zoomed across the sky holding his pistol. it had 
been a long time scince he had actually gone out and patroled, but he was 
actually going to meet with the new Royalty, Black Aracnia. He would reach 
the bunker soon.
    As his rear burst out in fire, sending him faster, he spotted the opening 
to the bunker. "AH Ha! The Royalty! Fear not, Inferno has come for you my 
Queen!"  He yelled with excitement and began to plummit towrds the ground.
    He landed, and tucked his balster away. There, leaning on the entrance, 
he saw Quickstrike. A bit puzzled at first he realized who it was an 
approached.
    "Hail fuzor Quickstrike. Where can I locate the Royalty?!!!" He said, 
saluteing when he said Royalty. He then ducked his head, arched his 
shoulders, and looked around the area suspiciously.
    He frowned and tilted his head, closer this time, and waited for the 
answer.

    Megatron had had the best CR dip in a long time. Waspinator had the same, 
and was now talking to Adrax. Megatron just sat and thought about his plans. 
Uniting the predacons into one fraction would be hard, impossible. But from 
the rumors Aracnia had already begun. He would have to talk to her about 
that....for now he just relaxed in the tank.
